content:
path /v3/multitoken/transaction/chain/address/tokenAddress
operationId MultiTokenGetTransactionByAddress
parameters
description Blockchain to work with
in path
name chain
required True
schema
type string
description Account address you want to get balance of
in path
name address
required True
schema
type string
description Address of the token smart contract
in path
name tokenAddress
required True
schema
type string
description Max number of items per page is 50
in query
name pageSize
schema
type number
maximum 50
minimum 1
required True
description Offset to obtain next page of the data
in query
name offset
schema
type number
description Transactions from this block onwards will be included
in query
name from
schema
type number
minimum 0
description Transactions up to this block will be included
in query
name to
schema
type number
minimum 0
summary Get Multi Token transactions on a blockchain address
description 1 credit per API call
Get incoming and outgoing Multi Token transactions on a blockchain address
This API is supported for the following blockchains

Celo
Ethereum
Polygon
responses
200
schema
type array
oneOf
MultiTx
type object
properties
blockNumber
type number
description Block number
txId
type string
description Transaction ID
contractAddress
type string
description Contract address
tokenId
type string
description ID of the token
amount
type string
description Amount of tokens transferred
from
type string
description Sender
operator
type string
description Operator
to
type string
description recipient
required
blockNumber
txId
contractAddress
tokenId
from
to
amount
operator
description OK
